meanings.definition: relating to Julius Caesar or the Caesars
meanings.sent1: The caesarian statues in the museum were very old.
meanings.sent2: The history book discussed the caesarian era in great detail.
meanings.sent3: The caesarian family tree had many branches.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership style was caesarian, commanding respect from all.
meanings.sent5: The caesarian architecture of the building reflected grandeur and power.

meanings.definition: a surgical operation for delivering a child by cutting through the walls of the abdomen and uterus
meanings.sent1: The doctor performed a caesarian to safely deliver the baby.
meanings.sent2: The hospital had a specialized unit for caesarian procedures.
meanings.sent3: The caesarian operation went smoothly, and the baby was born healthy.
meanings.sent4: She opted for a caesarian birth due to medical reasons.
meanings.sent5: The caesarian saved both the mother and the baby in a complicated delivery.
